get.description: Retrieve vessel position by mmsi, latitude/longitude range, timestamp range. If no filters provided, the response returns all vessel positions.

parameters.name: mmsi
parameters.description: Filter by Vessel ID (integer). Example mmsi=247039300

parameters.name: lon_from
parameters.description: Filter by minimum longitute (float). Example lon_from=15.4415

parameters.name: lon_to
parameters.description: Filter by maximum longitude (float). Example lon_to=19.3214

parameters.name: lat_from
parameters.description: Filter by minimum latitude (float). Example lat_from=34.67008

parameters.name: lat_to
parameters.description: Filter by maximum latitude (float). Example lat_to=41.2323

parameters.name: time_from
parameters.description: Filter by minimum timestamp (integer). Example time_from=1372666500

parameters.name: time_to
parameters.description: Filter by maximum timestamp (integer). Example time_to=1372683960

200.description: Returns the ships positions in various formats, according to the Content-Type header of the request.

429.description: Returned when max attempts limit is reached (default 10 per minute per ip address.

406.description: Returned when a not supported content-type for the response is requested.
